analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/

analyzed: phyin pa bcu ston ma/_/dam chos sgrol ma phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dus gsum bder

analyzed: bzhin dag par mkhyen/_/khams gsum po la chags mi mnga'/_/rgyal ba

analyzed: yin chags bral min/_/mi gnas sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/sangs rgyas kun

analyzed: gyi ye shes sku/_/gti mug mdongs pa'i sems can gyi/_/ma rig mun pa sel

analyzed: mdzad ma/_/bde gshegs sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis

analyzed: yon tan tshhogs/_/khengs pa zil gnon sems can gyi/_/nga rgyal ri bo

analyzed: 'joms mdzad ma/_/rin chen sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi

analyzed: dri med gsungs/_/'dod chags kyis gdungs sems can gyi/_/srid pa'i

analyzed: gdung ba sel mdzad ma/_/pad+ma'i sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/sangs rgyas kun
translated: you clear away the darkness of ignorance🔽of confused sentient beings,🔽I pay homage to you, Buddha Tara.

original: gyis mdzad pa mchog_/phrag dog gis bsnun sems can gyi/_/phrag dog zug
analyzed: gyis mdzad pa mchog_/phrag dog gis bsnun sems can gyi/_/phrag dog zug
translated: Of beings struck by jealousy,🔽I pay homage to you,

analyzed: rngu 'byin mdzad ma/_/'phrin las sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/sangs rgyas kun

analyzed: gyis rdo rje'i sku/_/khong khro bcom pa'i sems can gyi/_/zhe sdang mtshhon cha gcod

analyzed: mdzad ma/_/rdo rje sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshhal/_/gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sku 'dzin

analyzed: ma/_/phra dang rags pa'i gzugs dang bral/_/mtshhan dang dpe byad rnam par

analyzed: spras/_/rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/sgra brnyan lta bu'i gsungs brjod pa//
translated: You who speak with a voice like an echo,🔽Free from expression and syllables,

analyzed: brjod dang yi ge rnam par spangs/_/tshhig dang ngag gi lam las 'das/_/rdo rje'i
translated: Beyond the path of speech and words,🔽I pay homage to the vajra speech.

original: gsung la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/rmi lam lta bu'i thugs mnga' ma/_/dngos dang dngos med sogs mi mthong /_/rtag dang chad pa sogs mi shes/_/rdo rje'i thugs

translated: and so on, and do not know permanence,🔽annihilation, and so on.🔽I pay homage to your vajra mind.

original: la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/rdul bral mkha' khyab sgrol ma la/_/phyag bya phyag byed mi
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/rdul bral mkha' khyab sgrol ma la/_/phyag bya phyag byed mi

original: dmigs par/_/yan lag med cing lus med pa'i/_/gzugs med rdo rje'i lus
analyzed: dmigs par/_/yan lag med cing lus med pa'i/_/gzugs med rdo rje'i lus

analyzed: kyis 'dud/_/rtog med spros bral sgrol ma la/_/bstod bya bstod byed mi dmigs

analyzed: par/_/sgra dang brjod pa rnam bral ba'i/_/brjod med rdo rje'i tshhig gis bstod//

analyzed: tshhor bral dmigs med sgrol ma la/_/bsam bya bsam byed mi dmigs par/

analyzed: 'dzin pa med cing rig bral ba'i/_/rdo rje sems kyis rab tu 'dud/_/slob dpon a khyo b+h+ya badzras mdzad pa'o//_//
